divs: Sighting DetailsReturning to Lafayette, In from deer hunting at Salamonie on US 24 W I witnessedsome strange lights. After Wabash but before Peru a large amber light appearedin front of my vehicle maybe at 30 degree angle in WSW sky. Shortly afterseeing it oddly it blinked off. A few minutes later I saw a series of eitherlights of the same object or 4 different hovering objects blinking in sequence. The lights were kinda gourd shapedchanging in brightness. The lights weremostly white had other colors including green and amber toward the edges. Afterblinking in succession as if heading south came a blink further northnotaerodynamically possible. Each blink was similar colorbrightness and duration. No other lights were scene after this incident.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Peru
There were no other sightings in Peru on or around October 9th 2002
